import React from "react"; import { Form, Input, Select, Row, Col, DatePicker } from "antd"; const { RangePicker } = DatePicker; export default function SortForm() { const valueSearchAll = { status: "active", keyword: "123123", startDate: "01-10-2022", endDate: "30-11-2022", categories: "TcJAgpBIu_5t6ljAi2M_1", page: 1, } const changeSelectCategories = (Value) => { valueSearchAll.categories = Value?.join("_") }; const onChange = (fieldsValue) => { }; const [form] = Form.useForm(); return ( <>
); }
